page.title: 20LOOKING INTO THE FUTURE.
page.content: When we try to look into the future we look forward to some things and worry about others _ so do our parents. Some parents in 1985 have become unemployed for the first time in their lives and have little hope of getting new jobs.Also many school leavers are not able to find jobs.We worry if there will be enough jobs for us when we leave school. With all the new technology that keeps being developed our future should be an exciting one. We will probably have more time for leisure activities than our parents do. {Domesday Project 1985 New Waltham Primary School{Class 5 esp. D.Barker, K.Griffiths, L.Raven and S.Blendell. Mr.G.D.Bishop. Humberston Infants School Mrs.P. Gardner and{many children.}Enfield Primary School{4th year}and Mr.Randall
